General.Name: Miraculum SA
General.Description: Miraculum S.A., a cosmetics company, develops and markets face and body care, perfume, depilation, and make-up products for men and women in Poland and internationally. The company also offers shaving products and deodorants, as well as hair care products. It provides its products primarily under the Pani Walewska, Miraculum, Gracja, Tanita, Paloma, Joko, Chopin, Lider, Wars, and Byc Moze brands. The company was founded in 1924 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
